Jurisdiction Over theÂ Payment of Burial Benefits
The Manila RO has jurisdiction over the payment of burial benefits at the full-dollar rate under
PL 106-377
and
PL 108-183
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A - General Information on Philippine Cases
